title: random ingame fps drops
body: i tried everything i could, i use to get 150fps and stay with that all game but from the recent patch every minute i drop frames to 4fps even if i just stand there with nothing on my screen going on. i have rage quit due to dying from this and i just got a recent low priority ban because of it. please fix riot. i know it is not my computer.

replies.body: Since your fps is steadily dropping throughout the match, there might actually be some corrupted or damaged game files causing it. I'd suggest opening the game options and running a repair to make sure you've got a clean League install.
